verses.name: Psalms 147:1
verses.text: Praise ye the Lord: for it is good to sing praises unto our God; for it is pleasant; and praise is comely.

verses.name: Psalms 147:2
verses.text: The Lord doth build up Jerusalem: he gathereth together the outcasts of Israel.

verses.name: Psalms 147:3
verses.text: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.

verses.name: Psalms 147:4
verses.text: He telleth the number of the stars; he calleth them all by their names.

verses.name: Psalms 147:5
verses.text: Great is our Lord, and of great power: his understanding is infinite.

verses.name: Psalms 147:6
verses.text: The Lord lifteth up the meek: he casteth the wicked down to the ground.

verses.name: Psalms 147:7
verses.text: Sing unto the Lord with thanksgiving; sing praise upon the harp unto our God:

verses.name: Psalms 147:8
verses.text: Who covereth the heaven with clouds, who prepareth rain for the earth, who maketh grass to grow upon the mountains.

verses.name: Psalms 147:9
verses.text: He giveth to the beast his food, and to the young ravens which cry.

verses.name: Psalms 147:10
verses.text: He delighteth not in the strength of the horse: he taketh not pleasure in the legs of a man.

verses.name: Psalms 147:11
verses.text: The Lord taketh pleasure in them that fear him, in those that hope in his mercy.

verses.name: Psalms 147:12
verses.text: Praise the Lord, O Jerusalem; praise thy God, O Zion.

verses.name: Psalms 147:13
verses.text: For he hath strengthened the bars of thy gates; he hath blessed thy children within thee.

verses.name: Psalms 147:14
verses.text: He maketh peace in thy borders, and filleth thee with the finest of the wheat.

verses.name: Psalms 147:15
verses.text: He sendeth forth his commandment upon earth: his word runneth very swiftly.

verses.name: Psalms 147:16
verses.text: He giveth snow like wool: he scattereth the hoarfrost like ashes.

verses.name: Psalms 147:17
verses.text: He casteth forth his ice like morsels: who can stand before his cold?

verses.name: Psalms 147:18
verses.text: He sendeth out his word, and melteth them: he causeth his wind to blow, and the waters flow.

verses.name: Psalms 147:19
verses.text: He sheweth his word unto Jacob, his statutes and his judgments unto Israel.

verses.name: Psalms 147:20
verses.text: He hath not dealt so with any nation: and as for his judgments, they have not known them. Praise ye the Lord.
